content: sts knit a few row in your desired st pattern while decreasing at the 4 points on the neckline indicated with bobble and weave in the ends here are 3 ideas on how to finish the neckline garter st round 1 *p to 2 sts bef m p2tog sm* repeat from * to * p1 sm p2tog p to m sm p2tog p to borm round 2 *k to 2 sts bef m k2tog sm* repeat from * to * k1 sm k2tog k to m sm ssk k to borm repeat round 1 then bobble knitwise proceed to sleeve on page 18 rolled stockinette round 1 *k to 2 sts bef m k2tog sm* repeat from * to * k1 sm k2tog k to m sm ssk k to borm repeat round 1 a total of 3 times then bobble knitwise proceed to sleeve on page 18 see next page for instructions on how to finish the neckline with 2x2 rib 16 pattern neckline 2x2 rib sizes 1 4 and 9 round 1 *k2 p2* repeat from * to * till 5 sts bef m k2 p1 p2tog sm repeat from * to * till 2 sts bef m k2tog sm k1 k2tog p2 repeat from * to * till m sm ssk k1 p2 repeat from * to * round 2 *k2 p2* repeat from * to * till m sm repeat from * to * till 5 sts bef m k2 p1 p2tog sm k1 p2tog p1 repeat from * to * till m sm repeat from * to * round 3 *k2 p2* repeat from * to * till m sm repeat from * to * to 4 sts bef m k2 p1 rm cdd p1 repeat from * to * till m sm repeat from * to * bobble in pattern or italian bobble proceed to sleeve on page 18 sizes 2 3 5 7 and 8 round 1 *k2 p2* repeat from * to * till 3 sts bef m k1 k2tog sm p2 repeat from * to * till 2 sts bef m k2tog sm k1 k2tog p2 repeat from * to * till m sm ssk k1 p2 repeat from * to * round 2 *k2 p2* repeat from * to * till 2 sts bef m k2 sm p2 repeat from * to * till 5 sts bef m k2 p1 p2tog sm k1 p2tog p1 repeat from * to * till m sm repeat from * to * round 3 *k2 p2* repeat from * to * till 2 sts bef m k2 sm p2 repeat from * to * till 4 sts bef m k2 p1 rm cdd p1 repeat from * to * till m sm repeat from * to * bobble in pattern or italian bobble proceed to sleeve on page 18 size 6 only round 1 *k2 p2* repeat from * to * till 5 sts bef m k2 p1
